string-array.name: net_diag_err_link_quality
string-array.item: Poor Wi-Fi connection. Switch wireless bands or reboot the router.
"Can't access network. Reconnect to Wi-Fi or reboot the router."

string-array.item: Poor Wi-Fi connection. Switch wireless bands or reboot the router.
"Can't access network. Reconnect to WLAN or reboot the router."

string-array.item: Authentication is required for network access

Network error. Check if the router can access the internet.

string-array.item: "DNS server error. Check router's DNS configuration."
"Major delays from DNS server. Check router's DNS configuration."

string-array.item: "DNS server error. Check router's DNS configuration."

string-array.name: net_diag_err_network_latency
string-array.item: Major delays from the local network. Reboot the router or connect to another network.
Major delays from the internet. Check carrier network settings or connect to another network.

string-array.item: "Check router's DHCP settings and wired connection"

string-array.name: wifi_diag_err_wifi_base
string-array.item: "Couldn't turn on Wi-Fi. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Couldn't locate hotspot. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Can't turn on Wi-Fi. Turn Wi-Fi off and on again or reboot your router."
Wi-Fi has disconnected repeatedly. Turn Wi-Fi off and on again or reboot your router.
"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Turn off Airplane mode and try again."

string-array.name: wifi_diag_err_wifi_base_china
string-array.item: "Couldn't turn on WLAN. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Couldn't locate hotspot. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Can't turn on WLAN. Turn WLAN off and on again or reboot your router."
WLAN has disconnected repeatedly. Turn WLAN off and on again or reboot your router.
"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Turn off Airplane mode and try again."
